Docs.summary: Creates the theme specific-look for headers in .NET Framework 4.5 .

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the or properties are set on the , the rendering reverts back to the default implementation. ## XAML Object Element Usage ```   singleChild ``` ## XAML Values `theme:` An xmlns prefix for the CLR namespace. Typically, xmlns prefixes and mappings are defined in a XAML root element (not shown). *singleChild* A single object element child, representing the object that the border is drawn around. This object must be a .
